triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Paper evaluates chatbots as one type of conversational agent using proposed heuristics.

triples.name: Virtual assistant
triples.relevance: Paper evaluates voice-based personal assistants as conversational agents in the study.

triples.name: Heuristic evaluation
triples.relevance: Paper adapts heuristic evaluation methodology from Nielsen to create domain-specific heuristics for conversational agents.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: Paper focuses on evaluating dialogue content and interaction design, key components of dialogue systems.

triples.name: User interface design
triples.relevance: Paper addresses interaction design and usability of conversational interfaces as user interfaces.

triples.name: Human-computer interaction
triples.relevance: Paper contributes to HCI by proposing evaluation heuristics for conversational interfaces and human-like interaction characteristics.

triples.name: Usability
triples.relevance: Paper proposes new usability heuristics specifically tailored for evaluating conversational agent interfaces.
